mapper.select: SELECT a.JOB_ID, a.JOB_NAME, a.DEPT_ID, a.DEPT_NAME, b.FDEPT_ID, b.FDEPT_NAME FROM (SELECT j.`JOB_ID`, j.`JOB_NAME`, d.`DEPT_ID`, d.`DEPT_NAME` FROM job j LEFT JOIN dept d ON j.`DEPT_ID` = d.`DEPT_ID`) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT d.`DEPT_ID`, d.`DEPT_NAME`, d.`FDEPT_ID`, de.`DEPT_NAME` AS FDEPT_NAME FROM dept d LEFT JOIN dept de ON d.`FDEPT_ID` = de.`DEPT_ID`) b ON a.DEPT_ID = b.DEPT_ID ORDER BY FDEPT_ID
